Create a new ClubJudge Artist.

Example

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST / -d '{ \ "name": "teste-artist-create", \ "musicGenreIds": [8], \ "websiteUrl": "http://wearesingular.com", \ "email": "something@wearesingular.com", \ "avatarGuid": "55dbc4a8-c081-4322-a1d7-6b6ae6648586" \ }' \ https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/artists.json
